frame.label: Online Services account
frame.link:
Enter your Nuxeo Online Services account information and click on 'connect' button to retrieve the 'Studio' projects associated with your account. This step is required if you want to bind your Nuxeo plugins to a Studio project.
The Nuxeo Online Services subscription offers access to services, support, maintenance and customization tools to speed development time and future-proof your application. Nuxeo Online Services include Nuxeo Studio, Nuxeo Marketplace, Nuxeo Cloud and Nuxeo Support.
For more information see: Nuxeo Online Services introduction on www.nuxeo.com Nuxeo Online Services documentation
